scripts.install-modules: yarn --cwd client install && yarn --cwd shared install
scripts.build: yarn install-modules && yarn --cwd client build && yarn --cwd shared build
scripts.dev: yarn build && nodemon -r dotenv/config server/src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
scripts.docker: yarn build && node -r dotenv/config server/src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env
